item.title: New Beginnings
item.description: I am not that great at maintaining blogs, but I will try to do a better job with this attempt. I’m Predrag and welcome to my new blog. I will focus here mostly on cloud and security topics I get to deal on a daily basis, whether it is my research, fun or some work related stuff (of course without violating any NDA’s or confidentiality). On daily basis I work with Microsoft Cloud technologies as well as design, integrate and operate various security solutions.
